item.title: To Solve The TikTok Problem, Trump Has To Give Up His Control
item.description: A successful TikTok deal would end China’s leverage over the social media app in the U.S. — and Trump’s too.

item.title: President Trump Signals ‘Framework’ To Keep TikTok Running And Avoid Ban
item.description: Just days before another deadline approaches related to the TikTok ban, President Trump signaled that there’s a “framework” to keep the app running in...

item.title: Apple iOS 26 New Update Has Just Gone Live: Will It Work On Your iPhone?
item.description: Most years, when Apple releases new iPhone software, some models are left behind. That’s the case this time. Is your iPhone up to the task?

item.title: Meet Leader, The Therapy Dog Named USO’s Canine Volunteer Of The Year
item.description: Dogs helped Army veteran Renice Zimmerman cope with the death of her husband. Now she’s paying it forward to other military families with the breed he...

item.title: Ford Will Leave Its 1950s-Era Glass House For A New Headquarters
item.description: Ford Motor Co. plans to open a new headquarters, bringing an end to the Glass House era that began in 1956.
